app.name: Secure Element Cryptography demonstration
app.description: This application demonstrates cryptohraphical functions. Currently cupported devices: OPTIGA™ Trust M

app.name: Secure Element Certificates and data management demonstration
app.description: This application demonstrates Data Objects and Metadata Objects management. Currently cupported devices: OPTIGA™ Trust M

app.name: Secure Element Power Management demonstration
app.description: This application demonstrates power management. Currently cupported devices: OPTIGA™ Trust M

app.name: Secure Element Anycloud MQTT Client demonstration
app.description: This application demonstrates how to connect to an MQTT Server using a secure element and its pre-provisioned certificate.
